ComicInfo.Summary:
We’re sorry. Exemplar, the Savior of the Universe, can’t speak to you right now. He’s… um… not feeling well? But if you and the KNIGHTS EXEMPLAR armada currently surrounding our ship don’t mind waiting, our crew will have him fixed up in no time!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Rebekah Isaacs (a) & Eva de la Cruz (c) | 1-2 | B | Cover B | Connie Daidone | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Rebekah Isaacs | 4 | *Notes:* The Cover A and the 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover are a homage of the movie poster for Weekend at Bernie's.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 19:06:13. [CVDB804962] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:56:27. [Issue ID 2151595]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Connie Daidone,Eva de la Cruz,Rebekah Isaacs
